meanings.definition: Resembling or having characteristics of a human.
meanings.sent1: The robot had a humanoid shape.
meanings.sent2: The aliens were humanoid in appearance.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon characters were drawn with humanoid features.
meanings.sent4: The mannequins in the store window looked eerily humanoid.
meanings.sent5: The humanoid statue was so lifelike that it seemed almost real.

meanings.sent1: The science fiction movie featured alien humanoids.
meanings.sent2: The video game had various humanoid characters to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The zoo exhibit showcased mythical humanoid creatures.
meanings.sent4: The folklore stories often included encounters with humanoid beings.
meanings.sent5: The fantasy novel described a world inhabited by humanoid creatures.
